bibl.title: Nektanebo in the Vita Aesopi and in Other Narratives. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - The tale of Nektanebo and Olympias [in the Alexander Romance]. - Other narratives: Dream of Nektanebo, Demotic Chronicle and Praise of Imouthes. - The narratives about Nektanebo and Egyptian local colour in the 'Babylonian section' of the Vita. - Conclusion.
KONSTANTAKOS Ioannis M., Nektanebo in the Vita Aesopi and in Other Narratives. Avec résumé en anglais.
364 Alexandrum (ad) quae referuntur Somnium Nectanebi Vita Aesopi
